content.text: Dancer
Dual-wielding skirmisher. Constant movement, multi-target pressure, never where the enemy expects. Abilities focus on mobility, combo attacks, and evasion through motion.
T1 — Baseline (Free)
Fluid Movement (Passive): After making a melee attack, move 1 range band for free (0 AP).
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Riposte (Passive): When an enemy misses you in melee, free counterattack with off-hand at -1 accuracy. Once per round.
Blade Dance (Passive): When dual wielding, if both attacks hit the same target, the second deals +2 damage (flat, after armor).
Disengage (Active, 1 AP): Move 1 range band. No opportunity attacks. Clean exit.
Feint (Active, 1 AP): Your next attack this turn ignores the target’s Evasion bonus from shields or cover. You fake them out of position.
Quick Draw (Passive): Switching weapons costs 0 AP instead of 1. You’re always armed with the right tool.
Acrobatic Dodge (Passive): Once per round, when hit by a ranged attack, reduce damage by your Reflex bonus. You twist out of the shot’s path.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
Whirlwind (Active, 3 AP): One melee attack against every enemy within Close range. Same accuracy roll, each target hit/miss independently.
Evasive Stance (Passive): Dual wielding no longer applies -1 Evasion penalty. Your footwork makes you harder to hit.
Momentum (Passive): Each consecutive hit (without a miss) gives +1 accuracy to the next attack. Resets on miss.
Skirmish (Passive): If you moved this turn, your melee attacks get +1 accuracy. Rewards constant movement.
Redirect (Active, 1 AP): When an enemy attacks you in melee and misses, redirect their attack to an adjacent enemy. Use the original attack roll against the new target’s Evasion. Once per round.
Blinding Speed (Active, 2 AP): Your next 2 attacks this turn cost 0 AP. You move so fast the AP system can’t keep up. Once per encounter.
Twin Fangs (Passive): When dual wielding, if your first attack applies a condition (Bleed, Poison, etc.), your second attack applies it again automatically on hit. Double condition stacking.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)
Tempest (Passive): You can attack three different targets per turn. Each resolved independently.
Untouchable (Passive): While dual wielding and you moved this turn, enemies have -2 accuracy against you until your next turn.
One Thousand Cuts (Passive): Every melee hit in a turn after the second applies Bleed 1 to the target. Third hit: Bleed 1. Fourth hit: Bleed 2. Fifth hit: Bleed 3. The accumulation is devastating.

Dance of Death (Active, 4 AP): Move through every enemy within Close range, making one attack against each. You cannot be attacked during the movement. Resolve all attacks, then end in a position of your choice within Close range. Once per encounter. The signature Dancer move.
